page.title: 15HOLIDAYS.
page.content:
Only a few people come to this area for holidays. People in our area often go abroad. Some may fly from nearby {HEATHROW} Airport, which is also in Hillingdon.
For example,
{Holidays in 1985.} "We went on holiday to Corfu for a couple of weeks, we are very lucky in 1985 because we can get to foreign countries quickly by aeroplane. Hotels are nicely furnished many with their own bathroom and television sets. Our hotel had a balcony which overlooked the sea. They had very nice sun beds, so you could lie in the hot sun and get a brown tan. There was a very big swimming pool too. You can also climb up some big rocks. Corfu is a Greek Island."
